data.message:
So I’m reading all these comments and I’m confused it seems this is much deeper then I thought you people are really serious about the choosing side thing like it’s
Going to make a difference me personally I loved em so now it’s a lot like good ol mj you can’t help but listen but you feel so dirty lol but again choosing sides? Really? Are we gonna play a game? Are we racing? Oh is it a rap battle? Or do you really think that saying you choose em vs our president is
Going to do or change anything? Why would I choose em? Does he have the power to change my life your life everyone’s life and by everyone I mean the world. No, oh well the president does so yep all makes for a good read though
